reviewText: the late punong guro edgar sulite left us way too soon but his body of works remain as a testament of his love,dedication and skill in the art of eskrima.his step by step progression drills in the lameco sword and dagger system are explained in great detail.they easily bring the beginner a practical sense of awarness and range in relationship to the length of the sword and the shortness of the dagger as well as the footwork involved. this is a must have for martial artist's regardless of system or style.
